name: The Lost Fortress of Toral the Mad
name_original: The Lost Fortress of Toral the Mad
description: A one shot dungeon crawl, compatible with the Mausritter roleplaying game.  Created under the Mausritter third party license.  You and your fellow band of adventurers seek shelter in the roots of an old oak tree only to stumble upon the lost fortress of famed mercenary captain Toral.  It is said his band amassed great wealth before mysteriously vanishing.  Will you brave dangers both present and past to find out what happened to........The Lost Fortress of Toral the Mad?
